words.def: massive plantigrade carnivorous or omnivorous mammals with long shaggy coats and strong claws
One who engages in arbitrage, an arbitrageur.
`Johnny' was applied as a nickname for Confederate soldiers by the Federal soldiers in the American Civil War
an undergarment worn by women to support their breasts
a room or establishment where alcoholic drinks are served over a counter
the sense organ for hearing and equilibrium
a period marked by distinctive character or reckoned from a fixed point or event
a unit of surface area equal to 100 square meters
a soft silvery metallic element of the alkali earth group
a light strong brittle grey toxic bivalent metallic element
a rare heavy polyvalent metallic element that resembles manganese chemically and is used in some alloys
a trivalent metallic element of the rare earth group
a colorless and odorless inert gas
